title: Is the Canadian radiated Salmon linked to the Fukushima disaster?
subtitle: One sock salmon found in a Canadian lake in 2015 was tested positively for small amounts of Fukushima radiation, but this is not a clear health concern.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The first "irradiated salmon" due to the Fukushima nuclear disaster was found in British Columbia, Canada, posing a threat to human health.
